text: Until now , the role of the vast variety of DUBs in the replication cycle of viruses is poorly understood , although there is an increasing evidence that besides HIV also other virus families evolved strategies to hijack the UPS in order to accomplish their own replication successfully . For Taken together , these results indicate that DIs , especially those targeting USP7 and USP47 , not only inhibit HIV - 1 replication but also lead to an enhanced polyubiquitination and thus entry of Gag into the MHC - I pathway .
